name: Word Tower - A Word Game
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Test your vocabulary
Find the hidden words
Climb the towers
Become a master

Word Tower will test your vocabulary as you climb the towers filled with challenging levels. Begin your journey with the first tower and climb your way up to reach the final tower. Each tower and level will get progressively harder and will be unique, thanks to the game’s rich word database. Connect the letters without lifting your finger, find the hidden words on the board and climb the towers!

* 13 Towers and 450 Levels (More will be added)
* Rich Word Database
* A great way to test your vocabulary
* Free
publishers: FUGO BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI VE YAZILIM TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
